name: BOGs: Earth vs Sea
description:
In a competition to find out who will get married to the daughter of the mighty king, you will play as the mighty "God of Earth" to fight against the evil "God of Sea" and become the hero that protects the homeland.

Game Features:

  • The story is inspired by the legendary tale of the battle between "Son Tinh" and "Thuy Tinh" in Viet Nam
  • Classic side-scrolling action, tightly tuned 2D controls
  • Diverse, detailed world containing verdant forests, great deserts, fiery volcanoes, and vast swamps
  • Upgrade gears/skills/stats through completing each level
  • Steam achievements, steam cloud, full controller support
